sentences.sentence: After the call to kill Araki, put his scarab get me back!
sentences.translation: 杀掉召唤者阿拉基之后，就把他的圣甲虫给我拿回来！

sentences.sentence: The scarab image was used for recording historical events.
sentences.translation: 圣甲虫像用于记录历史性事件。

sentences.sentence: It is a scarab, a type which comprises 10 per cent of all beetles.
sentences.translation: 这是一种包括10%各种甲壳虫在内的圣甲虫。
